prefixIntro.title: 综合
prefixIntro.description: 包含一些难以归入其他具体类别，但同样重要的基础词汇。
prefixIntro.imagery: 一个百宝箱，里面装着各种形状和功能的零散物件。

words.imagery: 高耸的山峰和崎岖的地形，象征着对地球 (Geo) 面貌的记录与描绘 (Graphy)。

sentences.en: I love geography very much.
I want to be a geographer.
sentences.cn: 我想成为一名地理学家。

words.imagery: 一个循环的箭头，表示不断重复、周而复始的行为。

sentences.en: Study habits are very important.
Smoking is a bad habit.

words.imagery: 一本教科书或笔记本的页面，列出了要学习的项目。

sentences.en: There are eight subjects for us to learn this term.
sentences.cn: 这学期我们有八门科目要学。

words.imagery: 剧烈运动时，一颗带有速度感的汗珠飞溅而出，代表身体在努力降温。

sentences.en: I sweat a lot in summer.
Running in the heat makes me sweat.

words.imagery: 一个交通工具（如自行车或汽车）的简化图标，表示乘坐某种方式。

sentences.en: My mum goes to work by bike every day.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈每天骑自行车上班。

sentences.en: My father often travels by airplane.
sentences.cn: 我父亲经常乘飞机旅行。

words.imagery: 一个三角形的帐篷，代表露营。

sentences.en: We go camping every summer.
sentences.cn: 我们每年夏天都去露营。

sentences.en: This tent can hold 4 people.

sentences.en: The police arrived at the crime scene.

words.imagery: 一个飘忽不定的幽灵形状，象征萦绕不去。

sentences.en: She is haunted by the fear that her husband has an affair.
sentences.cn: 她被丈夫有外遇的恐惧所萦绕。

sentences.en: The rope is very strong.

sentences.en: I like my stuff.

words.imagery: 虚线圆圈中出现一个实心的加号，代表从无到有的创造。

sentences.en: Most westerners believe that God created the world.
sentences.cn: 大多数西方人相信上帝创造了世界。

words.imagery: 一艘雕刻成龙形的细长独木舟，整齐划一的船桨如同龙爪，随着鼓点在水面上飞驰。

sentences.en: The Dragon Boat Festival can be dated back to the Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 端午节可以追溯到周朝。

words.imagery: 一个方形盒子，上面打着蝴蝶结，象征惊喜和赠予。

sentences.en: I bought a birthday gift for my sister.
sentences.cn: 我给妹妹买了生日礼物。

sentences.en: People often fly kites in spring.
sentences.cn: 人们经常在春天放风筝。

sentences.en: I hope to go to the seaside during the summer vacation.

words.imagery: 一只对称的、拥有美丽翅膀的蝴蝶。

sentences.en: The butterfly is so beautiful.

words.imagery: 由简单的几何积木搭建而成，一个垂直的长方块代表其标志性的长脖子，稳固地连接在身体上。

sentences.en: A giraffe's neck is very long.

words.imagery: 标志性的大圆耳朵和黑色大鼻子，这张呆萌的脸庞是澳大利亚最可爱的象征。

sentences.en: The koala is a symbol of Australia.
sentences.cn: 考拉是澳大利亚的象征。

words.imagery: 标志性的大圆耳朵和圆润的脸庞，构成了老鼠最经典、最容易识别的卡通形象。

sentences.en: Most people don't like mice.

words.imagery: 一个简单的爪印，是毛茸茸的朋友在我们生命中留下印记的通用符号。

sentences.en: I raised two pets, a dog and a cat.
sentences.cn: 我养了两只宠物，一只狗和一只猫。
